pkmkdoc.description:
logKext v2.3 Snow Leopard update: 2009-11-18 Summary: LogKext is an open source keylogger for Mac OS X, a product of FSB software.
Requirements: Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard or 10.6 Snow Leopard (32-bit or 64-bit kernel)
Details: Simply install the package and logKext will begin running and logging all keystrokes. A logKext help HTML file will be installed in your root directory and opened after installation. LogKext v2.3 also includes a stand-alone script to uninstall logKext.
http://code.google.com/p/logkext/

choice.title: Readme
choice.description: This installs the readme file into the root directory of the disk.

choice.title: Uninstall Script
choice.description: This installs an uninstall script into the root directory of the disk.

choice.title: Core System
choice.description: This installs the core of logKext. It is required.
